p: This phase spans the day 8–14 of the disease course. Infectious toxic symptoms such as fever, fatigue, muscular soreness continue to exist or even aggravate. Patient’s body temperature rises, possibly to 39 °C or higher in a short time, and the high fever is persistent. Lung lesions demonstrate progressive exacerbation. A few patients (10–15 %) may develop ARDS, which is life threatening.
